name: Fieldrunners 2
description: Get ready to DEFEND THE WORLD! The biggest sequel in tower defense history is finally here: Fieldrunners 2 has arrived! From Subatomic Studios, creators of the award winning classic strategy game comes an all new adventure that was years in the making.
minimum_requirements: OS:Windows XP Service Pack 3Processor:Single-core 2.2 GHzMemory:1 GB RAMGraphics:OpenGL 1.5 compliant with 256 MB of video RAM, no shader support necessaryHard Drive:550 MB HD space
recommended_requirements: OS:Windows Vista or 7Processor:Dual-core 2.4 GHzMemory:2 GB RAMGraphics:OpenGL 1.5 compliant with 512 MB of video RAM, no shader support necessaryHard Drive:550 MB HD space

reviews.review_text: A semi-open enenmy pathing mechanic makes this game exceptional. Similar to how sanctum works, the enemy path is created by you as you maze your towers as effectively as possible. Enemy re-pathing isn't always consistent and can lead to difficulty disigning mazes at harder levels that limit your design by introducing new level mechanics or obstacles. Good fun overall and recommended for any casual td player.
Fun game to fill some time with that soon takes up your time... :D

This is very awesome. Fieldrunners test your strategy skills by putting you in charge of the good guy's defenses. You build towers to overcome all these waves of runners , planes, tanks, and more! It has achievements, too! It can also be bought on iOS and it's awesome.
This is the best tower defense game that I've played in quite some time. You all need to check it out while this summer sale is going on.
It is different than most tower defense games for PC. Maybe that's why I find it so addictive. It is a HUGE improvement over the first Fieldrunners.
Not exactly Defense Grid, is it...?
it's the same version for android, with the same in-apps trash.
Same as previous game in the series, matches are too artificially elongated. No.
Blew up a biplane with a mine. 11/10 would play again.
I love field runner! Been playing this on my phone for years and now on steam
Its a nice simple Tower defence. Pretty fun if you are looking to kill some time.
Easy to moderately difficult tower defense game.

I picked this up on a whim and I am surprised at the ammount of fun I am having with it. This is originally an iOS game, but it's a great little game to play at your desk too. The PC version has commentary, like you'd find on a DVD, on each map after you've beat it once, The art style is fun and there are some interesting map designs and Tower effects that make for good old fasion fun. Easy to play to just sit and knock out 15 minutes only to realize 2 hours shot by.

If you enjoyed Fieldrunners or even Defense Grid the Awakening, then this is a must have! So much extra stuff to do, and choosing your own towers most of the maps is great! Once you complete the goals on the wave maps, you can then continue on Endless mode for mass cash which you use to buy power ups which you use to complete missions. Awesome full circle playability.

Tower Defense is one of my favourite genre's and i bought this game about a week ago and have plowed 30 hours into it already. The problem is ive nearly 3 star every map and I still have alot of towers to unluck yet i fear within the next 5 or so hours play time i will have completed it, without much reason to return. The good side is that its a really good TD game, Ive enjoyed every frustrating minute! Just wish there was more.  Played on the pc version only.
If you like killing lots of things with all different kind of towers this is the game for you
So far, a brilliant tower defense game! (Oh, why not, I'll call if the most brilliant one!)
I play until I want to break something because I can't win. And I repeat.
